course_title: Adult Gerontology Primary Care NP Practicum I
course_description: This course will provide a clinical precepted practice with faculty oversight to develop skills in health assessment and physical exam, differential diagnosis, diagnostic reasoning and plan of care for common conditions encountered in primary care.
prerequisites: NRSG 701D and NRSG 704D and NRSG 706D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1564, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: P. Davis, Status: Open
